settings.heading: When should I place my order?
settings.row_content: Orders are due by 5 PM for Sunday evening delivery.

settings.heading: Is there an order minimum?
settings.row_content:
There is no order minimum!
With Ekam Organics, you can build your own dream menu. Whether that is grabbing a few chia puddings for a busy morning or nourishing snack, or getting a full stock for meals to enjoy throughout the week.

settings.heading: Do you do substitutions or modifications?
settings.row_content: No, we do not make any substitutions or modifications. If you would like a custom order please e-mail ekam@ekamhealthandholistics.com.

settings.heading: How long do the foods, soups, juices, and dressings last?
settings.row_content: All of our foods, soups, juices, and dressings last up to 6 days in the refrigerator.

settings.heading: Is all of your food organic?
settings.row_content: Yes! All of our produce is 100% organic - including our oils, vinegars, spices, butters, and grains. We are dairy, free, seed oil free, refined sugar free, and vegan.

settings.heading: How does Delivery/Pickup work?
settings.row_content:
We offer delivery across the Chicago-land region every Sunday from 3:00PM-7:00PM. We have a flat delivery fee of $11. We ask for your phone number at checkout should the courier service need to contact you about delivery. 
We also offer a free pickup option Mondays from 10AM-12PM in River North. If selected, the pickup address will be provided upon checkout.

settings.heading: How does pickup work?
settings.row_content: When you checkout, select the pickup option. Once you place your order, we'll send you the pickup address. When you arrive, please wait in your car at the curb. Ekam will bring your order out to you!

settings.heading: How often do you deliver?
settings.row_content: We deliver once a week, on Sundays.

settings.heading: What type of packaging do you use and is it recyclable?
settings.row_content:
90% of our packaging is made from recyclable glass. The rest of our packaging is made from renewable plant-based materials. This packaging is 100% compostable, and becomes soil within 2-6 months when composted in a commercial facility.
Ekam Organics stands by our initiative and pillar to create a greener Earth. Our packaging utilized agricultural byproducts to support farmers and reduce waste. The production process also uses fewer resources and produces less pollution than traditional manufacturing.

settings.heading: Do you offer catering?
settings.row_content: Yes, we do! We can cater the options that we have on the menus along with custom items. For inquiry please e-mail ekam@ekamhealthandholistics.com

settings.heading: Have a question? Don't worry, we have you covered!
